molSimplify.Informatics.jupyter_vis module¶

Py3Dmol install: (works in both Python2/3 conda environments) conda install -c rmg py3dmol Some Documentation: https://pypi.org/project/py3Dmol/ 3DMol.js backend: http://3dmol.csb.pitt.edu/index.html

molSimplify.Informatics.jupyter_vis.view_xyz(xyz_names, w=400, h=400, columns=2, representation='stick', labelsize=18, labels=True)¶

py3Dmol view atoms object(s) xyz_names = xyz files that will be rendered in a tiled format in jupyter (list,str) w = width of frame (or subframes) in pixels (int) h = height of frame (or subframes) in pixels (int) cols = number of columns in subframe (int) representation = how the molecule will be viewed (str) labelsize = size of the data label (in Points) (int) labels = turn labels on/off (bool)
